short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The addon replaces the deprecated nCore URL to the new and adds a new nCore link for searching the whole season.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Using the addon you will have a proper nCore link (.pro instead of .cc) on WhatNext (https://whatnext.cc/).
Also, it will show you entire season links and not just episode links.


DISCLAIMER
This is neither a WhatNext nor a nCore product. Created for fun and personal use.
